component.name: S3Drive
component.summary: Zero Knowledge E2E encrypted storage compatible with any S3 provider

description.p: S3Drive is an easy-to-use client that converts any S3 server into your personal encrypted file storage. Your files are encrypted before they leave your device, so no one beside you can access them. Not even us.

Features: Rclone compatible E2E encryption, Filename/filepath encryption, Photo & video backup, File versioning, Secure sharing via encrypted link, Desktop two-way sync, Offline files, ZIP download, Multiple accounts support, Search recursively, Manage files & directories (open, preview, download, copy, delete, rename, folder upload etc.), Preview different file formats, Support streaming of encrypted videos, Edit text files, Object Lock support, Mount S3Drive as disk (desktop), List and grid view, Light and dark themes,
Available on: Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux, Web Desktop clients: https://s3drive.app/desktop Browser web client: https://web.s3drive.app
Support for AWS S3, Backblaze, Wasabi, Cloudflare, MinIO and any other S3 compatible provider. Sign-up for a free account, no credit card required.
Our roadmap: https://s3drive.canny.io/ Order by (name, size, modified), Cross-client online sync, Listing cache, ... and many many more, vote in our roadmap and stay tuned !
We would love to hear from you ! Missing some features? App not working as intended? Please visit our Discord or reach us at: support@s3drive.app
